ygData.subject: Re: A question regarding quests...
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/6/99, 11:51:19 AM, EverQuest@onelist.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/6/99, 11:51:19 AM, EverQuest@onelist.com writes:
<<I've seen lots of quests listed on various web pages, and have considered
running through a few. However, the one quest I have done was not worth the
effort, though the role-playing was fun.

What quests are worth attempting? And for what reason (role-playing or
financial)?>>


Is it just me, or do most people agree that the financial and item rewards
for quests are PITIFUL???? At least for the lower level quests this seems to
be the case. As far as the experience points, jeez, I could get 3-4 times
the experience just killing easy mobs in a fraction of the time it takes to
complete just one quest!! Considering how hard it is just to FIND a quest
much less COMPLETE a quest, the typical reward of a few copper and maybe a
lantern or such is REDICULOUS.

Wizaro on Sollusk Ro
